mapper.insert: INSERT INTO request_buy_record(created_at, updated_at, cost, request_user_id, title) VALUES(NOW(), NOW(), #{cost}, #{requestedUserId}, #{title})
mapper.select: SELECT record.id AS record_id, record.created_at as record_created_at, record.updated_at as record_updated_at, record.is_deleted as record_is_deleted, record.is_allowed as record_is_allowed, record.is_done as record_is_done, record.title as record_title, record.cost as record_cost, record.allow_user_id, record.request_user_id, request_user.id as uid, request_user.name as request_user_name FROM request_buy_record record, user request_user WHERE record.request_user_id = request_user.id AND request_user.id = #{requestUserId} AND (request_user.name like #{keyword} OR record.title like #{keyword} ) AND record.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY record.created_at ${orderBy} LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}
